lesson_list.title: ひらがな - あ、い、う、え、お
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the basic vowel sounds in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - a, i, u, e, o

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - か、き、く、け、こ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (K) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - ka, ki, ku, ke, ko

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - さ、し、す、せ、そ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (S) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - sa, shi, su, se, so

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - た、ち、つ、て、と
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (T) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - ta, chi, tsu, te, to

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - な、に、ぬ、ね、の
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (N) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - na, ni, nu, ne, no

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - は、ひ、ふ、へ、ほ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (H) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - ha, hi, fu, he, ho

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - ま、み、む、め、も
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (M) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - ma, mi, mu, me, mo

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - や、ゆ、よ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (Y) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - ら、り、る、れ、ろ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (R) in the Japanese language.
lesson_list.title_romanization: Hiragana - ra, ri, ru, re, ro

lesson_list.title: ひらがな - わ、を、ん
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the particle (W), and (N) sound in the Japanese language.
